OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_DURATION_PERIOD.description: The period of time to await between two runs of the connector.

ALIENVAULT_BASE_URL.description: The base URL for the OTX DirectConnect API.

ALIENVAULT_TLP.description: The default TLP marking used if the Pulse does not define TLP.

ALIENVAULT_CREATE_OBSERVABLES.description: If true then observables will be created from Pulse indicators and added to the report.

ALIENVAULT_CREATE_INDICATORS.description: If true then indicators will be created from Pulse indicators and added to the report.

ALIENVAULT_PULSE_START_TIMESTAMP.description: The Pulses modified after this timestamp will be imported. Timestamp in ISO 8601 format, UTC.

ALIENVAULT_REPORT_TYPE.description: The type of imported reports in the OpenCTI.

ALIENVAULT_REPORT_STATUS.description: The status of imported reports in the OpenCTI.

ALIENVAULT_GUESS_MALWARE.description: The Pulse tags are used to guess (queries malwares in the OpenCTI) malwares related to the given Pulse.

ALIENVAULT_GUESS_CVE.description: The Pulse tags are used to guess (checks whether tag matches (CVE-\d{4}-\d{4,7})) vulnerabilities.

ALIENVAULT_EXCLUDED_PULSE_INDICATOR_TYPE.description: The Pulse indicator types that will be excluded from the import.

ALIENVAULT_ENABLE_RELATIONSHIPS.description: If true then the relationships will be created between SDOs.

ALIENVAULT_ENABLE_ATTACK_PATTERNS_INDICA.description: If true then the relationships `indicates` will be created between indicators and attack patterns.

ALIENVAULT_FILTER_INDICATORS.description: This boolean filters out indicators created before the latest pulse datetime, ensuring only recent indicators are processed.

ALIENVAULT_DEFAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE.description: The default x_opencti_score to use for indicators. If a per indicator type score is not set, this is used.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_IP.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for IP indicators.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_DOMAIN.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for Domain indicators.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_HOSTNAME.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for Hostname indicators.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_EMAIL.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for Email indicators.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_FILE.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for StixFile indicators.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_URL.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for URL indicators.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_MUTEX.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for Mutex indicators.

ALIENVAULT_X_OPENCTI_SCORE_CRYPTOCURRENC.description: (Optional): The x_opencti_score to use for Cryptocurrency Wallet indicators.

ALIENVAULT_INTERVAL_SEC.description: The interval in seconds between each run of the connector.
